snippet.title: Atmosfear / NightMare (Jul 12, 1994 prototype) (Unreleased SNES Game)
snippet.description:
A newly discovered unreleased SNES game based on the VHS board game "Atmosfear" (also known as NightMare) has now been released! This game has never been seen in media before aside from a few brief mentions in various magazines. This game was developed by Beam Software, who was responsible for Radical Rex, Shadowrun, and Tom & Jerry - Frantic Antics.

Read the release article for this prototype here:
https://bit.ly/2D1a06F

Social Media:

Twitter - https://twitter.com/HiddenPalaceOrg
